column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Baked Goat Cheese (circa 1992) was exquisite in smell
column3: it was rich and lingered. I was less interested in foie gras terrine as they just lifted California's ban on selling it. I went with a mix of the east and west coast oysters. Mallet crushed ice was used (more on that later). Excellent
column5: plenty of self encapsulating liquid in each
